quiz.question: When did the American Civil War begin?
What year did Martin Luther King Jr. deliver his 'I Have a Dream' speech?
In what year did the first self-propelled steam locomotive successfully operate, marking early railway history?
When did the Moon landing of Apollo 11 occur?
Which year did the Spanish conquest of the Aztec Empire culminate with Tenochtitlan's fall?
What year did Belgium gain independence from the Netherlands following the Belgian Revolution?
In what year did the Magna Carta get sealed at Runnymede?
When was the Treaty of Tordesillas, dividing new lands between Spain and Portugal, signed?
In what year did the Black Hawk War, signaling final Native American resistance in Illinois region, take place?
In what year did the Warsaw Pact formally dissolve?
What year was the Berlin Airlift initiated in response to the Soviet blockade?
In what year did the Paris Commune arise as a radical socialist government in the city?
In which year did the UK pass the Act of Union creating the United Kingdom of Great Britain?
What year did the Franco-Prussian War end, leading to German unification under the Second Reich?
In what year did the Battle of Tours halt Umayyad expansion into Western Europe?
